mapper.select: update clickpagenum set startclicknum = startclicknum-10, endclicknum = endclicknum -10 where startclicknum>0 AND endclicknum>0
update clickpagenum set startclicknum = startclicknum+10, endclicknum = endclicknum +10 where startclicknum>0 AND endclicknum>0
SELECT distinct(p.pagenum) FROM notice n, pages p, clickpagenum c WHERE p.pagenum Between c.startclicknum AND c.endclicknum AND n.notice_index BETWEEN p.startnum AND p.endnum Order by p.pagenum
